actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a woman who is otherwise qualified may become entitled to widow's insurance benefits (subject to the existing actuarial reductions) at age 50 whether or not disabled).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that a woman who is otherwise qualified for benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) may become entitled to widow's insurance benefits (subject to the existing actuarial reductions) at age 50 whether or not disabled.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a woman who is otherwise qualified may become entitled to widow's insurance benefits (subject to the existing actuarial reductions) at age 50 whether or not disabled).
